Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C
150 East 10th Avenue
Denver, Colorado 80203
PH 303.831.7364 Fx 303.832.2628
www.hmflaw.com

September 3, 2020

VIA OVERNIGHT DELIVERY

Southern District of New York
Court Clerk's Office
500 Pearl Street
New York, NY 10007-13122

Re: US v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 cr. 330 (AJN) Notice of Appeal

Dear Clerk of Court:

Attached hereto is the Notice of Appeal for filing and a check in the amount of $505.00 for the docketing and processing fees.

If you have any questions, please feel free to call me at the phone number referenced above.

Very truly yours,

Nicole Simmons

Nicole Simmons

Enclosures

DOJ-OGR-00019243

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Nicole Simmons of Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C to the Clerk of Court for the Southern District of New York. It is regarding the Notice of Appeal in the case US v. Maxwell, Case No. 20 cr. 330 (AJN). The letter is dated September 3, 2020, and includes a check for $505.00 for docketing and processing fees.
